lead_paragraph: Kerry Wood was placed on the disabled list earlier this month for a blistered right index finger, his second time on the disabled list this season.
snippet: Kerry Wood was placed on the disabled list earlier this month for a blistered right index finger, his second time on the disabled list this season.

headline.main: Indians Activate Woods After Trading Kearns
headline.print_headline: Indians Activate Woods After Trading Kearns
